alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 23 at 11:29AM AKDT until July 25 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 4 AM AKDT TUESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * TIMING...From 1 PM Monday to 4 AM AKDT Tuesday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...West 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Lightning from scattered thunderstorms on Monday afternoon and evening could lead to new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
